thread.title: This crazy buzzer-beater from 70 feet doesn't even make sense
thread.title_full: This crazy buzzer-beater from 70 feet doesn't even make sense

author: Keith Wagstaff
title: This crazy buzzer-beater from 70 feet doesn't even make sense
text:
I've seen a lot of buzzer-beaters over the years, but this is might be the best ever.
I mean, look at this shot from Destiny Slocum.
DESTINY SLOCUM, WE ARE NOT WORTHY #SCtop10 #FearTheTurtle pic.twitter.com/7QVTNmy2cZ
— Maryland WBB (@umdwbb) March 19, 2017
She shoots from 70 feet out with seconds left in the half ... with two hands over her head like a damn soccer throw-in. I didn't even know that was a thing. Let's see Steph Curry try to match that.
SEE ALSO: This March Madness, Julia Louis-Dreyfus is America's favorite sports mom
Destiny's Maryland Terrapins went on to beat the West Virginia Mountaineers 83-56 to advance to the Sweet 16 in the NCAA women's tournament.
Destiny Slocum...ARE YOU SERIOUS
— Scott Abraham (@ScottABC7) March 19, 2017
Most amazing shot of this college b-ball weekend goes to Maryland's Destiny Slocum, who just made one from basically outside the building.
— Jen Chaney (@chaneyj) March 19, 2017
In honor of @umdwbb 's Destiny Slocum and her amazing shot this afternoon in the #ncaaw tournament. #goterps #awestruck pic.twitter.com/vjM7iPRIkr
— Grant L. (@haveagrantday) March 19, 2017
Maybe next game she'll scoot back and shoot one from the stands.
